overview: Lee Yeon-moo is a successful condominium distributor who has a dream to use his wealth to try out for the National Assembly. While he is actively lobbying his way around, a man named Lee Sang-doo threatens him to expose his inappropriate relationship with a woman who has a practical part in the distribution business. One day, Lee Yeon-moo is found dead in his car after meeting Lee Sang-doo....
title: Ill-Behaved as Always
